entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 10:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to a few flurries in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
